definition: root/basis/classifier for long slender objects, e.g. cigarettes, guitar strings/CL:條|条[tiao2]/radical (chemistry)

sentences.english: As Morgan rightly observes, here is the prototype of the self-governing American township.
sentences.chinese: 摩爾根說得對，這是美洲市鎮自治區的一種原型。

sentences.english: Molkenkur and Nussloch are in completely opposite directions.
sentences.chinese: 摩爾根療養院和胡桃衚衕是完全相反的方向。
